text: nir (avarkalin viruppappati) avarkalitam or attatciyaik kontu varavittal, "nir inta attatciyai en kontu varavillai?" Enru ketparkal; (nir kurum;) nan pinparruvatellam en iraivanitamiruntu enakku arivikkappatuvataittan; (tirukkur'an akiya) itu unkal iraivanitamiruntu vanta arivoliyakavum, nervaliyakavum, nallarulakavum irukkinratu - nampikkai konta makkalukku
